summary: Close-out 015: ingest exports, run schema/DQ checks, set acceptance, and submit completed report.

directives.details: Load composite_export.json/csv from Toyfoundry canary; record record counts and verify SHA256.
Run non_empty, allowed_rituals/status, units_positive, duration_ms_range; capture failures with thresholds.
Provide Go/No-Go with metrics and constraints; document any blockers and remediation.
Update and submit report at exchange/reports/inbox/order-2025-10-15-019-report.json with status=completed and monitoring notes.
